"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a504da6368722fd4fc0300#post_54a504da6368722fd4fc0300
I try to avoid it, mostly. Somethings I do want to have a say in. But my say is that of one whose thinks SJWs actually have some legitimate points as well those who oppose them. Sooooo yeah. No gonna win me any fans.

Letting it out once in while makes me feel better. Like now. Even if it's sure to end with me being known as "that asshole who hates all men, is a SJW, etc, etc"
